original_text: And it was an hand breadth thick, and the brim thereof was wrought like the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies: it contained two thousand baths.
korean_text: 바다의 두께는 한 손 너비만 하고 그것의 가는 백합화의 양식으로 잔 가와 같이 만들었으니 그 바다에는 이천 밧을 담겠더라

sentences.original_text: And it was an hand breadth thick
and the brim thereof was wrought like the brim of a cup

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 이천 바트를 담을 수 있었다
